name: Off Course (Hennejoe, Dawn Nyan)
description:
You awaken from Cryosleep to find your ship flying out of control and into a nearby star - Can you escape before you meet your fiery fate? 

Uncover the mystery of the ship along the way!

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

Ctrl - Crouch

Space - Jump

UPDATE: This build has a slower Sun Speed + various bug fixes - https://drive.google.com/file/d/16BehQCdXyJNlyqwn9auoaTZBTTMpSM-W/view?usp=shari...

Made for the GTMK 2020 Game Jam.
